s.text: Frank was referred to me by the guy who was referred to me by another guy."
He"ll be asking all the lawyers who refer penniless clients to him, to set up a fee schedule like his, so he can refer his overflow to them.

He uses the same federal poverty guidelines to determine his hourly rate, which tops out at $87.

It"s endemic to the entire profession, Snider said: "Basically if you"re rich, you can hire lawyers, and if you"re poor, you can have one appointed.

If he did advertise, his volunteer, 45-hours-a-week office manager Jody Smith, no relation, says she might kill him.
